casebody.data:
Lorenzo Prado NAVARETTE and Jose Prado Navarette, petitioners,
v.
CALIFORNIA. No. 12-9490. Supreme Court of the United States Nov. 4, 2013.

Motion of petitioners for leave to proceed further herein in forma pauperis granted. Motion of petitioners for appointment of counsel granted. Paul Kleven, Esquire, of Berkeley, California, is appointed to serve as counsel for the petitioners in this case.
